Name: Customer IC & Expertise
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(DESCENDANTS(STRTOMEMBER("[SLS_CUSTOMER].[" + [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC]) + "]")) , 0) , ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])))) AND ((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Expertise] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Expertise])))))}
